info.name: joinquit
info.author: Noki
info.description: Messages in the chat when players join or quit

setting.name: *showColorCodes
setting.desc: Allow hex color codes in nicknames to be shown in the chat

setting.name: *defaultColor
setting.desc: If show color codes is set to true, this controls what color to output messages in

setting.name: *nickChangeDelay
setting.desc: Time in miliseconds between a player being able to change their name to prevent nick change spam
